scriptedEmail.name: User Changed Email Address Email
scriptedEmail.description: Sends an email to the old email address of a member whose email address has changed.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Disclaimer">If you didn't make this change, please contact the site administrator as soon as possible.</resource> <resource name="Body_Introduction">A request was made to change an email address associated to your account:</resource> <resource name="Body_PrivateEmailAddressChanged">Account email address changed from {old_email_address} to {new_email_address}</resource> <resource name="Body_PublicEmailAddressChanged">Public email address changed from {old_email_address} to {new_email_address}</resource> <resource name="Subject">Your email address was changed on {site_name}</resource> <resource name="Header">Your email address was changed on {site_name}</resource> </language>
